ygData.subject: Re: Abit on The Tribunal.
ygData.msgSnippet: Bloody goon, log into Innoruuk so that  the perverted wizs, the pimping paladin, the tree poking druid or I can recruit you into the guild......
ygData.messageBody:
Bloody goon, log into Innoruuk so that the perverted wizs, the pimping
paladin, the tree "poking" druid or I can recruit you into the
guild......

"Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" wrote:

> Hi,Recently i am pissed with verant nerfing my pet and DOT, so i
> decided to play another char for the time being. i created a Dark Elf
> Wizard (yes dark elf again) on The Tribunal Server and he is now level
> 10 (only 1 day and 19 hours to play - hehe). Somethings i really got
> to say. The lower levels for wizard is hard and necro is much easy
> during those levels since root get resisted alot and wizards heavily
> rely on tanks for support. However, wizard down its target real fast
> after level 8. Imagine i kill dw snakes and wisp at level 9-10 when my
> necro cant do that until level 12 then i stand half a chance.Another
> thing, with my dark elf wizard being agnostic, i start with dubious to
> most good people (yes include freeport) and i was told that the
> faction can be improved to a extend that i can trade in freeport n use
> the bank (BUT i dont its impossible in fay since elves really hate
> dark elves). Also, i spoken to a few, alot of high level folks
> restarting in this server - couple of level 40-50s. So far the highest
> i have seen is level 21 by today!Thast all for now, will keep u guys
> updated. hehee.. FreedDark Elf Wizard in his 10th evil years (The
> Tribunal)p/s : anyone want to join me when you are bored? main reason
> im here bcos Innoruuk is all screwed and at least it wont for this for
> quite some
> time.--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
>
